name: John Smith
bio: John is a principal software engineer at Microsoft with over 15 years of experience in building scalable cloud applications. He specializes in .NET and Azure technologies.

sessions.title: Building Modern Web Apps with Blazor
sessions.description: Learn how to build interactive web applications using Blazor WebAssembly and .NET 9

sessions.title: Advanced C# Patterns
sessions.description: Deep dive into advanced C# patterns and best practices

name: Sarah Johnson
bio: Sarah is a DevOps engineer and cloud architect specializing in Kubernetes and container orchestration. She's passionate about automation and infrastructure as code.

sessions.title: Kubernetes Best Practices
sessions.description: Master Kubernetes deployment strategies and best practices for production environments

name: Michael Chen
bio: Michael is a solutions architect at AWS with expertise in serverless architectures and distributed systems. He helps companies modernize their applications.

sessions.title: Serverless Architecture Patterns
sessions.description: Explore modern serverless patterns using AWS Lambda and Azure Functions

sessions.title: Microservices at Scale
sessions.description: Learn how to design and implement microservices that scale

name: Emily Rodriguez
bio: Emily is an AI/ML engineer specializing in natural language processing and computer vision. She has published multiple papers on deep learning applications.

sessions.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
sessions.description: Get started with machine learning using practical examples and real-world use cases

name: David Park
bio: David is a frontend architect passionate about user experience and accessibility. He's a core contributor to several open-source UI frameworks.

sessions.title: Modern Frontend Development
sessions.description: Explore the latest trends in frontend development including React, Vue, and Blazor

sessions.title: Accessibility in Web Applications
sessions.description: Learn how to build accessible web applications that work for everyone

name: Lisa Anderson
bio: Lisa is a database architect with deep expertise in SQL, NoSQL, and distributed databases. She specializes in performance optimization and data modeling.

sessions.title: Database Performance Tuning
sessions.description: Master the art of database optimization and performance tuning
